column4: i have ubuntu 12.04 and dell 5010 laptop. my laptop fan work more than usual. why ?
look at top    see if anything unusual is chewing up resources.
l3top where i shud look ?
in a terminal type   top        type :q  to quit
l3top . ok and then ..?
look for anything that is using up a lot of cpu
thus raising your temperature, thus kicking the fan
something is using 100% of cpu l3top
what is using 100% of cpu
ty guntbert
l3top  someone say that my ATI geraphic in not install correct. so fan work more
that was my next question after getting the output of WHAT was eating your cpu to confirm esak. Please give me a the output of lspci -nn | grep VGA
someone say  heat of laptop and fan work. maybe for geraphic. i think my vga is not install correct
that was my next question after getting the output of WHAT was eating your cpu to confirm esak. Please give me a the output of lspci -nn | grep VGA  from a terminal
output of lspci -nnk | grep -i VGA -A2" is ---> http://paste.ubuntu.com/1077064/ is it install coreccet ?
that looks correct. Please give me the output of apt-cache policy fglrx | grep stall
l3top output is --->http://paste.ubuntu.com/1077070/
that looks correct. You have the correct driver for your GPU installed.
again... if you could type: top          in a terminal... it will tell you WHAT processes are using HOW MUCH cpu.
l3top when i go to system setting then additional driver. see 2 line for ATI/AMD . i active one of them. do u want see it pic ?
You have the correct driver installed. I have asked you like 5 times for the result of top. I am not asking anymore
one gedit is using 100% of cpu because im installing vga driver manule. but other time like when i open  4 or 5 tab of fire fox fan work more and have hot temperature
l3top  one gedit is using 100% of cpu because im installing vga driver manule. but other time like when i open  4 or 5 tab of fire fox fan work more and have hot temperature
I'm out. You aren't listening to me.
